website_summaries.verdict: A multipurpose floor cleaner that does a good job on carpets.
pros: Does a good job of taking out pet odors
Works well when you take the time to presoak
cons: Product can leave behind a chemical smell
Doesn't do as well as others on cat urine

customer_reviews.title: updated review
customer_reviews.text: red wine spilled on new beige berber carpet and new love seat- blotted first and use full strength as soon as it happened- hoped for the best- stains completely gone- all our guests were amazed- a few ordered that night after they saw what it did- will never be without this product have order 3 times ( 5 gallons) over the last year)- use as our main cleaner
customer_reviews.author: marc

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST CARPET CLEANER - E V E R
customer_reviews.text: We have tried at least ten carpet cleaning products for our expensive Hoover Max Extract carpet shampoo machine before trying GENESIS. We had embarrassing stains & odor from our beloved puppy babes. Genesis brought our carpets back to new!! No ‘resurfacing stains’, no more odor at all!! Don’t waste money on any other product. It’s a bit pricy, but worth every single cent!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Keasey

customer_reviews.title: Best stain remover you can buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. Cleans and refreshes. Removes stains. Follow the directions and you will be as pleased as I have been!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! This product is my go to for all ...
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! This product is my go to for all my household cleaning. I have 2 Pekingese dogs who love to rub their faces on everything. This product has worked wonders even on my stainless steel appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta K.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Smells like gasoline. Takes urine smell away. Very hard to lift the big size we bought.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: It's a little high but does work. Got urine smell and old stains out of my carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Elvis L.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff!! Works great on pee stains and odor.
customer_reviews.author: Tanna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! This will be my go to cleaning ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! This will be my go to cleaning product from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Teakbear

customer_reviews.title: This stuff destroys odors
customer_reviews.text: Works great in the carpet extractor but... the very best way to use, if you have a pet that stains the floor, is to buy a 1 gallon sprayer. Fill with 16 ozs of 950 and half a gallon of water. Pump it up and use to treat stains. Leave it sit on dried on stains for 5 minutes then wipe up. Will destroy odors!
customer_reviews.author: J. Amato

customer_reviews.title: incredible product
customer_reviews.text: Started by getting a gallon now I always buy it in bulk. Better than anything I've ever tried. Works great and pulls up stuff you won't believe is there. I've used it in many ways and many concentrations. If you try it you will be hooked.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Makes my 13 year old carpet look new!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order this stuff is amazing I have used multiple cleaners but this stuff paired with my rug doctor machine makes my 13 year old carpet look new if you’re thinking about purchasing this don’t hesitate you won’t be sorry!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: John Giuffre

customer_reviews.title: My liquid gold
customer_reviews.text: I have tried almost every product out there. This is by the far the best product. The products that I have tried never got rid of the smell of urine. This one does almost immediately. I call it my liquid gold.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cleans like crazy ! But , damn ! Pretty chemical smelling for in the house !
customer_reviews.author: Brian L. Bennington

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter recommended this product after her using it. Delivery time was prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: IT STILL WORKS GREAT!!! Works great!!! I tried the 1 gallon first, I was blown away so I picked up the 5 gallon. Loosens up all the dirt & the machine picks it right up. Leaves the room smelling fresh. O, we use this product on our hotel guest room carpets. So you know if it clean up hotel guest room carpets than just imagine what it can do at home?!
customer_reviews.author: Dae
